[OBJECTS]
# -- BRICK--
#type	x	y	ani
#type: 0 = mario
#type: 1 = ground, pipe; 2 = block, cloud; 3 = brick reward
#type: 4 = goomba normal, 5 = goomba wings
#type: 6 = green koopas walk, 7 = green koopas wings, 8 = red koopas
#type: 9 = fire bullet, 10 = red mushroom, 11 = green mushroom, 12 = leaf
#type: 13 = question brick mushroom, 14 = question brick mushroom leaf
